## castComputed() function

计算用函数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function castComputed<T, Args extends any[]>(computedFunc: Type.Function<Args, T>, ...computedArgs: Args): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  computedFunc | <code>Type.Function&lt;Args, T&gt;</code> | 计算用函数 |
|  computedArgs | <code>Args</code> | 计算用参数 |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`

computedFunc(...computedArgs) -<!-- -->&gt; 计算结果

## Example 1


```
castComputed((a, b, c) => a + b + c, 1, 2, 3);
// => 6

```

## Example 2


```
castComputed(a => a);
// => undefined

```
